properties.name: GENERATION_PROMPT_PATH
properties.description: Path to a custom a file which contains the prompt that Gemini will use on the video.

properties.name: MODEL_NAME
properties.description: The model to use for Gemini inference. Examples: 'gemini-1.5-flash', 'gemini-2.5-pro'.

properties.name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
properties.description: Path to a JSON file containing your GCP credentials for Vertex AI.

properties.name: PROJECT_ID
properties.description: The project identifier to access Vertex AI.

properties.name: BUCKET_NAME
properties.description: The name of the bucket to store data for the project.

properties.name: LABEL_USER
properties.description: The user accessing the Vertex AI.

properties.name: LABEL_PURPOSE
properties.description: The purpose of using the Vertex AI.

properties.name: GENERATION_MAX_ATTEMPTS
properties.description: Two kinds of checks are performed on the model response: 1) response is not empty and has valid JSON in the correct format, and 2) the response timeline falls within the video segment length determined by the model. Each check has a separate counter. This value specifies the maximum number of attempts for each check. Each failed check results in another attempt to regenerate the response.

properties.name: TIMELINE_CHECK_TARGET_THRESHOLD
properties.description: Specifies the number of seconds that video events can occur before or after a segments' bounds. If exceeded, another attempt will be made to generate the output. Set to -1 to disable check.

properties.name: TARGET_SEGMENT_LENGTH
properties.description: Default segment length is 120 seconds. Set to -1 to disable segmenting the video.

properties.name: VFR_TARGET_SEGMENT_LENGTH
properties.description: Default segment length is 120 seconds. Set to -1 to disable segmenting the video.

properties.name: SEGMENT_LENGTH_SPECIFICATION
properties.description: The value for determining how to interpret TARGET_SEGMENT_LENGTH, VFR_TARGET_SEGMENT_LENGTH, MIN_SEGMENT_LENGTH, and VFR_MIN_SEGMENT_LENGTH. The value has to be SECONDS for this component.

properties.name: MERGE_TRACKS
properties.description: In the context of videos, when set to true, attempt to merge tracks from the entire video.

properties.name: QUALITY_SELECTION_PROPERTY
properties.description: The detection property to be used to rank the quality of a track and the quality of the detections in a track. This property would be used, for example, to select the exemplar detection for a track.

properties.name: PROCESS_FPS
properties.description: Specifies the number of frames per second of video to process.

actions.name: GEMINI VIDEO SUMMARIZATION ACTION
actions.description: Runs Gemini with a prompt for the provided video.
